rComments: Easily my favourite prof of all time, exceptionally clear lectures. You always know exactly what is going on and you know the motivations for doing every derivation. Seems like a very kind person too. Highly recommend taking any course with Michael Luke!

Amazing lectures. Third year u of t university physics specialist here and Michael Luke is the best instructor I've had. Crystal clear lectures that are amazing. Although I have to get up at 9am to attend his class I'd never miss it.

Good lecturer and and accessible in office hours but didn't solve the assigned problems himself first which often made it hard for him to provide guidance. Course material is difficult but quite interesting as it unifies many concepts learned previously. The exams were straightforward. Great introduction to higher-level physics.

Amazing lectures; you can tell he put a lot of effort into preparing/organizing so that the material can be accessible. Make sure you keep up and review often as the concepts take time to sink in (particularly tensors if they are new to you). Hmwk/tests are fairly standard; do non-mandatory problems too, they appear on tests.
